p: Yield and protein recovery of the three fractions, plus the protein content of LM and extracted fractions are displayed in Table 3. The protein contents of the three fractions were not significantly different to each other ( p > 0.05, p = 0.073). After processing, their combined average protein content (73.6%) was 23.8% higher than the LM, illustrating significantly higher ( p < 0.05, p = 0.000) protein content than whole locusts.
